definitions.definition: A person with whom one shares a room , as in a dormitory , barracks , rooming house , or apartment .
A person sharing the same home albeit not the same room (but generally not a family member or spouse).
definitions.label_groups: US , Australia , New Zealand , Philippines , Canada

definitions.definition: A same-sex significant other with whom one lives; a coinhabitant in a non-heterosexual relationship.

main_definition: A person with whom one shares a room , as in a dormitory , barracks , rooming house , or apartment .
secondary_definitions: ( US , Australia , New Zealand , Philippines , Canada ) A person sharing the same home albeit not the same room (but generally not a family member or spouse).
( LGBTQ slang , humorous , ironic ) A same-sex significant other with whom one lives; a coinhabitant in a non-heterosexual relationship.
